caption.p: Evaluation of chimeric avian influenza virus pathogenicity in mice. (A) Diagrammatic representation of the construction of the chimeric avian influenza A viruses utilized in the study (see Fig. S1 in the supplemental material and Materials and Methods for additional details). (B) Weight loss in mice following intranasal inoculation of 10 3 PFU of the H1 PB2-E627 and H1 viruses. (C) Weight loss in mice following intranasal inoculation of 10 3 PFU of the chimeric H1 to H16 viruses in mice. (D) Weight loss in mice following intranasal inoculation of 10 3 PFU of the H7-Shanghai and H7-Anhui viruses. (E) Lung titers (PFU/g) from the above infections at 3 days postinoculation (DPI).
